parameters.name: events
parameters.description: DOM events that will reset the activity timer.

parameters.name: initialState
parameters.description: The initial idle state. Useful for SSR or background tab scenarios.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Duration in milliseconds before the user is considered idle.

returnValues.name: isIdle
returnValues.description: Returns true if the timeout has been reached without user interaction.

returnValues.name: lastActiveAt
returnValues.description: The timestamp (ms) of the most recent user activity detected.
